001package com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.currentStatus;
002
003import org.apache.commons.lang3.Validate;
004import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.Message;
005import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.MessageType;
006import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.annotations.MessageProps;
007import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.helpers.Bytes;
008import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.models.NotificationEnum;
009import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.models.NotificationMessage;
010import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.AlarmStatusRequest;
011
012import java.math.BigInteger;
013import java.util.HashSet;
014import java.util.Set;
015import java.util.TreeSet;
016
017/**
018 * Response message for {@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.AlarmStatusRequest}, opCode 69, size 8
019 *
020 * <br>
021 *
022 * 
023 * <table border='1'>
024 * <caption>Message properties:</caption>
025 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>opCode</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>69</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
026 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>size</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>8</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
027 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>type</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.MessageType#RESPONSE}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
028 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>request</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.AlarmStatusRequest}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
029 * </table>
030 */
031@MessageProps(
032        opCode=69,
033        size=8,
034        type=MessageType.RESPONSE,
035        request= AlarmStatusRequest.class
036)
037public class AlertStatusResponse extends NotificationMessage {
038    private BigInteger intMap;
039
040    // private val unused, but placed to force java tostring to include the formatted alerts set
041    private Set<AlertResponseType> alerts;
042
043    public AlertStatusResponse() {}
044
045    public AlertStatusResponse(BigInteger intMap) {
046        this.cargo = buildCargo(intMap);
047        parse(cargo);
048    }
049
050    public AlertStatusResponse(byte[] raw) {
051        parse(raw);
052    }
053
054    private static byte[] buildCargo(BigInteger byte0uint64) {
055        return Bytes.toUint64(byte0uint64.longValue());
056    }
057
058    public void parse(byte[] raw) {
059        Validate.isTrue(raw.length == props().size());
060        intMap = Bytes.readUint64(raw, 0);
061        cargo = raw;
062        alerts = getAlerts();
063    }
064
065    public BigInteger getIntMap() {
066        return intMap;
067    }
068    public long getBitMap() {
069        return intMap.longValue();
070    }
071
072
073    @Override
074    public int size() {
075        return alerts==null ? 0 : alerts.size();
076    }
077
078    public enum AlertResponseType implements NotificationEnum {
079        LOW_INSULIN_ALERT(0, "Low amount of insulin remaining in the cartridge."),
080        USB_CONNECTION_ALERT(1, "Pump is not charging over USB."),
081        LOW_POWER_ALERT(2, "Power level is low and the pump needs to be charged."),
082        LOW_POWER_ALERT2(3, "Power level is low and the pump needs to be charged."),
083        DATA_ERROR_ALERT(4),
084        AUTO_OFF_ALERT(5, "The pump is about to turn off due to the configured auto-off interval."),
085        MAX_BASAL_RATE_ALERT(6, "The pump is delivering at the maximum allowed basal rate."),
086        POWER_SOURCE_ALERT(7, "The power source provided is not able to charge the pump."),
087        MIN_BASAL_ALERT(8, "The pump is delivering at the minimum allowed basal rate."),
088        CONNECTION_ERROR_ALERT(9),
089        CONNECTION_ERROR_ALERT2(10),
090        INCOMPLETE_BOLUS_ALERT(11, "The bolus window was opened but a bolus was not started."),
091        INCOMPLETE_TEMP_RATE_ALERT(12, "The temp rate window was opened but the temp rate was not started."),
092        INCOMPLETE_CARTRIDGE_CHANGE_ALERT(13, "The cartridge change was started but not completed."),
093        INCOMPLETE_FILL_TUBING_ALERT(14, "Fill tubing was started but not completed."),
094        INCOMPLETE_FILL_CANNULA_ALERT(15, "Fill cannula was started but not completed."),
095        INCOMPLETE_SETTING_ALERT(16),
096        LOW_INSULIN_ALERT2(17, "Low amount of insulin remaining in the cartridge."),
097        MAX_BASAL_ALERT(18, "The maxmium basal was reached."),
098        LOW_TRANSMITTER_ALERT(19, "The CGM transmitter battery is low."),
099        TRANSMITTER_ALERT(20, "There is an alert from the CGM transmitter."),
100        DEFAULT_ALERT_21(21),
101        SENSOR_EXPIRING_ALERT(22, "The CGM sensor is expiring soon."),
102        PUMP_REBOOTING_ALERT(23, "The pump is rebooting."),
103        DEVICE_CONNECTION_ERROR(24),
104        CGM_GRAPH_REMOVED(25,
105                "It has been 24 hours since your last sensor session ended, so your " +
106                          "current glucose reading now displays the last glucose value entered in the bolus calculator."),
107        MIN_BASAL_ALERT2(26, "The pump is delivering at the minimum allowed basal rate."),
108        INCOMPLETE_CALIBRATION(27, "The CGM calibration was incomplete."),
109        CALIBRATION_TIMEOUT(28, "The timeout was reached for CGM calibration."),
110        INVALID_TRANSMITTER_ID(29,
111                "The Dexcom G6 or G7 transmitter ID is invalid."),
112        DEFAULT_ALERT_30(30),
113        DEFAULT_ALERT_32(32),
114        BUTTON_ALERT(33, "The pump button was held down for too long and is temporarily disabled to avoid accidental delivery of insulin."),
115        QUICK_BOLUS_ALERT(34, "Quick bolus mode was entered but no bolus was started."),
116        BASAL_IQ_ALERT(35, "BasalIQ has reduced basal insulin to avoid a low."),
117        DEFAULT_ALERT_36(36),
118        DEFAULT_ALERT_37(37),
119        DEFAULT_ALERT_38(38),
120        TRANSMITTER_END_OF_LIFE(39, "The CGM transmitter is reaching its end of life and cannot be used."),
121        CGM_ERROR(40, "CGM error reported"),
122        CGM_ERROR2(41, "CGM error reported"),
123        CGM_ERROR3(42, "CGM error reported"),
124        DEFAULT_ALERT_43(43),
125        TRANSMITTER_EXPIRING_ALERT(44, "The CGM transmitter is expiring soon."),
126        TRANSMITTER_EXPIRING_ALERT2(45, "The CGM transmitter is expiring soon."),
127        TRANSMITTER_EXPIRING_ALERT3(46, "The CGM transmitter is expiring soon."),
128        DEFAULT_ALERT_47(47),
129        CGM_UNAVAILABLE(48, "The CGM is unavailable due to a problem with the sensor."),
130        FILL_TUBING_STILL_IN_PROGRESS(49, "The fill tubing process is still in progress and was not completed."),
131        DEFAULT_ALERT_50(50),
132        DEFAULT_ALERT_51(51),
133        DEFAULT_ALERT_52(52),
134        DEFAULT_ALERT_53(53),
135        DEVICE_PAIRED(54, "The pump was paired successfully to a Bluetooth device."),
136        DEFAULT_ALERT_55(55),
137        DEFAULT_ALERT_56(56),
138        DEFAULT_ALERT_57(57),
139        DEFAULT_ALERT_58(58),
140        DEFAULT_ALERT_59(59),
141        DEFAULT_ALERT_60(60),
142        DEFAULT_ALERT_61(61),
143        DEFAULT_ALERT_62(62),
144        DEFAULT_ALERT_63(63)
145        ;
146
147        private final int bitmask;
148        private final String description;
149        AlertResponseType(int bitmask) {
150            this.bitmask = bitmask;
151            this.description = null;
152        }
153
154        AlertResponseType(int bitmask, String description) {
155            this.bitmask = bitmask;
156            this.description = description;
157        }
158
159        public int bitmask() {
160            return bitmask;
161        }
162
163        public int getId() {
164            return bitmask;
165        }
166
167        public String getDescription() {
168            return description;
169        }
170
171        public boolean isKnownAlert() {
172            return description != null && !description.isBlank();
173        }
174
175        public String toString() {
176            return name();
177        }
178
179        public BigInteger withBit() {
180            return BigInteger.ZERO.setBit(bitmask);
181        }
182
183        public static AlertResponseType fromSingularId(long id) {
184            for (AlertResponseType type : values()) {
185                if (type.bitmask == id) {
186                    return type;
187                }
188            }
189            return null;
190        }
191    }
192
193    public Set<AlertResponseType> getAlerts() {
194        Set<AlertResponseType> current = new TreeSet<>();
195        for (AlertResponseType type : AlertResponseType.values()) {
196            if (intMap.testBit(type.bitmask())) {
197                current.add(type);
198            }
199        }
200
201        return current;
202    }
203
204    @Override
205    public Set<Integer> notificationIds() {
206        Set<Integer> ids = new HashSet<>();
207
208        for (AlertResponseType alert : getAlerts()) {
209            if (alert.isKnownAlert()) {
210                ids.add(alert.getId());
211            }
212        }
213
214        return ids;
215    }
216}
